page.title: 19LEISURE ACTIVTIES
page.content: Our class takes part in a variety of leisure activities. Some go to the Youth Club where they play rounders, table tennis, pool, etc. They may have a disco or watch a video film. Ten boys are members of Pentland Boys' Club where they have football training. Others, in the Scouts, take part in outdoor hobbies like camping, hillwalking and abseiling. Many girls are interested in dancing of various kinds, Highland, Disco and Ballet, all of which require special outfits. Other girls attend Red Cross to learn First Aid and Child Care. The Swimming Club is popular and members go to Edinburgh to compete. Among the church organisations attended are Girls' Brigade, Sunday School, Campaigners and the Salvation Army. During the winter most of our class attend school badminton.
